data.caption: Corrigendum To The Audited Standalone Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended On March 31, 2022 Of Sterling And Wilson Renewable Energy Limited
data.news_body:
This has reference to the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2022 approved by the Board of Directors and filed with the Stock exchanges on April 07, 2022.

In this regard, please note that there was an inadvertent typographical error in the earnings per equity share (EPS) for the Audited Standalone Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2022. The details of correct figures are attached.

The signed Limited Review Report was received from the Statutory Auditors at 05:40 p.m.

Request you to take the same on records.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of Sterling And Wilson Solar Limited ('The Company')
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the SEBI Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company ('the Board') at its meeting held today i.e. Saturday, August 14, 2021, inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company. The same is enclosed herewith.

The said meeting commenced at 03:30 p.m. and concluded at 05:00 p.m.

The signed Limited Review Report was received from the Statutory Auditors at 05:40 p.m.

Request you to take the same on records.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith the disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended March 31, 2021.

data.news_body: Pursuant to the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith a copy of the Investor presentation on the Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021.

data.news_body: Pursuant to the Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Tuesday, June 29, 2021, inter alia considered and approved the Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021 ('Audited Financial Results').

data.news_body: Pursuant to the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith a copy of the Investor presentation on the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2020.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter Ended December 31, 2020
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of Sterling and Wilson Solar Limited (the Company) at its meeting held today i.e. Friday, February 12, 2021, inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31, 2020 along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company. The same is enclosed herewith.

The Board meeting commenced at 04:30 p.m. and concluded at 08:10 p.m.
